title: TutsPlus - Hands On Using Phone Gap
description: You probably already know HTML, CSS, JavaScript and the basics of database-driven applications. In this course we put all of those tools to work to build a mobile application in PhoneGap for iOS and Android devices. We also build a simple API for the app, so you can collect data and dynamically display it inside the app. By the time weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re done, all that will be left is for you to package it up and put it up for sale in the Android and iOS app stores!
